Sioux_City.Sioux City Linseed Oil Works: The Sioux City Linseed Oil Works is a historic building located in Sioux City, Iowa, United States. It is located in an area east of the central business district where warehouses and other industrial buildings are located. It housed the Sioux City Linseed Oil Works (initially known as Hubbard and Gere) from 1884, when it was built, until 1927 when its owner, the American Linseed Oil Company, ceased production here.
